channel.title: Boundswords 317 - Need 3 Content Developers!
channel.description:
[center][b][size=18pt]BoundSwords 317[/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GXbwc.png[/img]
I have a purchased domain for 1 year, "Boundswords.com". I plan to make some use of it. The hosting has ended, however once we finish everything up and are ready to enter the beta stage I will create some more banners/advertisements to get us players to test bugs/glitches/dupes. I will purchase hosting, and we will need to have a webclient made aswell when beta is released. I'm not going to make a fancy thread, no need for that.
Basically I'm a decent rsps coder, however I do need some help, and with a development team we could finish the server/client so much faster.
I need someone who has almost complete knowledge in client & server developing. We will be using runesource, and a 317 packaged client.
Things I have added: Gem crafting (Doesn't give experience yet) [img]http://i.imgur.com/6YDFO.png[/img]
Fixed an interface bug, displaying the wrong interface for wielding weapons. [img]http://i.imgur.com/Xt1Aq.png[/img]
Added a shop: [img]http://i.imgur.com/mi72d.png[/img]
Content Developers: (0/3) 1) 2) 3)[/b][/center]

item.title: Boundswords 317 - Need 3 Content Developers!
item.dc:creator: @Syphogoth Syphogoth
item.description:
@Syphogoth wrote:

[center][b][size=18pt]BoundSwords 317[/size]

I have a purchased domain for 1 year, “Boundswords.com”. I plan to make some use of it. The hosting has ended, however once we finish everything up and are ready to enter the beta stage I will create some more banners/advertisements to get us players to test bugs/glitches/dupes. I will purchase hosting, and we will need to have a webclient made aswell when beta is released.
I’m not going to make a fancy thread, no need for that.

Basically I’m a decent rsps coder, however I do need some help, and with a development team we could finish the server/client so much faster.

I need someone who has almost complete knowledge in client & server developing.
We will be using runesource, and a 317 packaged client.

Things I have added:
Gem crafting (Doesn’t give experience yet)

6YDFO.png773×531

Fixed an interface bug, displaying the wrong interface for wielding weapons.
